meanings: tune up ahead of the performance
resolve differences among the branches of the government

vlive.korean: [조율부절] 뭔 소리예요! [The real YU RI is nervous] What are you talking about? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [IZ*ONE] 나코야!! 네가 내 별이야!! (HAPPY NAKO DAY+1)

vlive.korean: 각자의 스타일이 조금 달랐을 것 같은데 의견 조율은 어떻게 했어요? I'm sure you all had different styles and opinions. How did you all agree on one? 듣기 View video Mnet : 프로듀스101 시즌2 6화

vlive.korean: 귀염둥이 유리 - 조율! Cutie pie, Yuri! - Jo Yuri! 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 아이즈원과 함께 송편만들기🌕
뭔가 의견 조율할 때 더 좋지 않아요? 편하니까? and decide on things together? It would be more comfortable. 듣기 View video JBJ95 : [#지금하95] 켄타켄타켄타켄타켄타켄타
vlive.english: and decide on things together? It would be more comfortable.

vlive.korean: 브아걸도 조율해야 돼 막 스탭들 눈치 봐. I had to keep Brown Eyed Girls in check and keep an eye out for the staff. 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : < 쎈마이웨이> 남의 말에 잠을 못 자요

examples.korean: By definition Supply Chain Management or SCM is the process of planning, implementing and controlling the operations of the supply chain and one of the most important functions of SCM is the coordination and collaboration with channel partners. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 공급망 관리인 SCM은 정의상 공급망 운영의 계획, 실행 그리고 통제의 최적화 프로세스입니다. SCM의 가장 중요한 기능 중 하나는 채널 동업자 간의 조율과 협력입니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: By definition Supply Chain Management or SCM is the process of planning, implementing and controlling the operations of the supply chain and one of the most important functions of SCM is the coordination and collaboration with channel partners. Add to Wordbook
